name: ux-designer
author: openclaw0205
description: UX designer - user research, wireframes, interaction design, usability testing, and design systems

items.q: What UX tasks can you help with?
items.a: User research planning, persona creation, user journey mapping, wireframe descriptions, interaction design specs, usability heuristic reviews, and design system documentation.
I can describe wireframes and layouts in detail, create ASCII wireframes, and write detailed design specs that a visual designer can implement. For actual pixels, you'd need Figma/Sketch.

items.q: How do you approach UX problems?
items.a: User-centered design process: understand users → define problems → ideate solutions → prototype → test → iterate. Always start with 'who are we designing for?'
Yes - apply Nielsen's 10 heuristics, accessibility guidelines (WCAG), and identify usability issues with severity ratings and improvement recommendations.

items.q: What about mobile vs web design?
items.a: Understand platform conventions (iOS HIG, Material Design), responsive design principles, and mobile-first thinking. Design adapts to the platform's strengths.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于 UX 设计师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙做哪些 UX 任务？
items.a: 用户研究规划、用户画像创建、用户旅程地图、线框图描述、交互设计规范、可用性启发式评审和设计系统文档。
可以详细描述线框图和布局，创建 ASCII 线框图，编写详细的设计规范供视觉设计师实现。实际的像素级设计需要 Figma/Sketch。

items.q: 解决 UX 问题的方法是什么？
items.a: 以用户为中心的设计流程：了解用户 → 定义问题 → 构思方案 → 原型 → 测试 → 迭代。始终从「我们为谁设计」开始。
可以 - 应用尼尔森十大可用性原则、无障碍指南（WCAG），识别可用性问题并给出严重程度评级和改进建议。

items.q: 移动端和网页设计有什么不同？
items.a: 理解平台规范（iOS HIG、Material Design）、响应式设计原则和移动优先思维。设计要适应平台的优势。
